description: This file defines the SearchResultsAdapter class, which is a RecyclerView adapter for displaying search result videos in a list or grid. It manages binding video data to views, handles accessibility features, and responds to user interactions like clicks and focus changes.

classes.name: SearchResultsAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView adapter that displays a list of videos for search results, reusing the item layout and handling user interaction, accessibility, and dynamic content updates.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and returns a new ViewHolder for the RecyclerView by inflating the video card layout.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds a Video object to the provided ViewHolder, setting UI elements, accessibility descriptions, and interaction handlers.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of videos in the current list.

methods.name: submitList
methods.description: Updates the adapter's video list with a new list and refreshes the displayed items.

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Retrieves the Video object at the specified position, or null if out of bounds.
